note: Polymer types are as follows: LDPE (Low-density polyethylene); HDPE (High-density polyethylene); PP (Polypropylene); PS (Polystyrene); PVC (Polyvinyl chloride); PET (Polyethylene terephthalate); PUT (Polyurethanes); and PP&A fibres (polyester, polyamide, and acrylic fibres).
title: Primary plastic waste generation by polymer
subtitle: Global primary plastic waste generation by polymer type, measured in tonnes per year. Polymers have been coloured based on recyclability where blue is widely recycled; yellow is sometimes recycled depending on local context; and red is usually non-recyclable
